'''1.20.3 Pre-Release 4''' (known as '''1.20.3-pre4''' in the launcher) is the fourth and final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.20.3]], released on November 28, 2023,<ref>{{mcnet|minecraft-1-20-3-pre-release-4|Minecraft 1.20.3 Pre-Release 4}}</ref> which fixes bugs. This is the final pre-release released in 2023.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.20.3 Pre-release 4
|;dev
|266968|{{cmd|return}} executed within an advancement reward function globally discards all subsequent commands.
|267062|Server list ping icon doesn't display tooltip.
}}</onlyinclude>
